comments.body: might be helpful to repeat the "Short lived certificates set NotAfter=Now()+TTL, ignoring Backdate." bit in this doc.

would it be helpful to say something like this somewhere?
```
All certificates set NotBefore=Now()-Backdate.
Long-lived certificates set NotAfter=Now()+TTL-Backdate.
Short-lived certificates set NotAfter=Now()+TTL.
```
See what you think of the updated go docs.
does anything make sure Backdate < TTL? this becomes more important when the duration hint is under user control and could be set super short

Based on the 10 minute minimum outlined in the CSR duration KEP, do you think [this comment](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/99412/files#diff-13be1b8eeba9e7ea31ad3a75cee7bae2d0d396368c0baf184b0498e334c66a93R196) is sufficient?
